welcome.windowBody: I craft clean and modern web apps that make ideas come alive
welcome.name: Yuri Verbitsky
welcome.media: Find me in social media, click the links below

aboutText.first: Four years ago, I tried my hand at web development for the first time at university. Honestly, at that time I thought I would go to game dev, but the code for websites suddenly tightened
aboutText.second:
Since then, I've been expanding my horizons: from the first simple pages,
 I've moved on to a full-fledged workbench, trying different technologies and approaches to
 creating interfaces.
aboutText.third:
I'm currently studying at my second university, testing new techniques and frameworks, 
 and constantly looking for fresh ways to make the web faster, more convenient, and more beautiful
